name: Ahmet Arslan
body:
I am a senior search architect with over eight years of hands-on experience in [Apache Lucene/Solr](http://lucene.apache.org/solr/) and related technologies. I took leading search architect role in several Apache Lucene/Solr projects in Turkey including:
* a leading e-commerce company
* an online retail company
* an online legal search engine for legal and law related documents
* an enterprise search application for call center employees
* an online food ordering portal

The experiences I have acquired during the projects combined with my solid academic background on the field become the personal asset that I rely on most: my ability to combine theory and practice.

I am a committer and Project Management Committee member at The Apache Software Foundation. As someone who believes in open source, I am enthusiastic to help organizations and companies to migrate from proprietary software to its open-source counterpart.

Ahmet Arslan has been working as Research Assistant at [Anadolu University](https://academy.anadolu.edu.tr/displayx.asp?acc=aarslan2&kod=1) since December 2004.
